[h1]Please Note This.[/h1] This mod was implemented for the personal streaming. Therefore, It may be inappropriate for general runs. Also, we cannot guarantee the compatibility with other mods.
[h1]Introduction[/h1] Redrawn Mod was developed for TBoI: Time Attack Race, which is one of the contents that [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/afreecaBJHY/]HY[/url] creates. Since redrawn mod is currently a beta version, there's nothing lot to write down... I'd add things later ğŸ˜…
[h1]Mods that recommended[/h1] We highly recommend that use Kor version of External item descriptions https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1630138997 More mods gonna be added here...I hope
